channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- StoredIQ
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- StoredIQ

item.title: CVE-2018-1927|2024-09-16T18:59:42.002Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoredIQ 7.6 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 153118.

item.title: CVE-2019-4165|2024-09-16T18:28:20.787Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoreIQ 7.6.0.0. through 7.6.0.18 could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service attack using repeated requests to the server. IBM X-Force ID: 158698.

item.title: CVE-2019-4166|2024-09-16T19:20:15.757Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoredIQ 7.6 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 158699.

item.title: CVE-2018-1583|2024-09-16T16:18:04.831Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoredIQ 7.6 could allow an authenticated attacker to bypass certain security restrictions. By sending a specially-crafted request, an authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access and manipulate documents on StoredIQ managed data sources. IBM X-Force ID: 143331.
